body.para: On Aug 29, 2006, at 3:58 PM, Shlomi Fish wrote:

quote.quotepara: Well, we can use any of the following designs, which are much better:
I recall seeing even better looking planets in my neverending web surfing. Plus, we can always re-use a theme of WordPress or whatever.

body.para: I personally much prefer the current custom, unique layout than ripping either one of those (or any other, for that matter) sites' layouts or simply taking a wordpress theme and adapting it.
I don't necessarily agree with the current one being "ugly", per se, though I agree it needs some work. Mostly it's too bulky. I like the idea of making it look like a layers dialog a lot.
